articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Benin's interior minister says a coup announced earlier has been foiled - NPR
articles.description: Earlier, a group of soldiers had appeared on Benin 's state TV Sunday to announce the dissolution of the government in an apparent coup, the latest of many in West Africa.
articles.content:
COTONOU, Benin A coup that was announced in Benin on Sunday has been "foiled," the interior minister said in a video on Facebook.
"In the early morning of Sunday, Dec. 7, 2025, a small group of sold… [+1993 chars]
